Subject: Burn the MAGGOTs!
MessageBody:
By the name of #TAMASH ,

Today I heard a #MAGGOT talking about us. It was talking only non-sense as all the #MAGGOTs .

hen it laughed about the #BLAZE we conducted last week.

I KNOW THEY ARE AFRAID!! THEY WILL #BURN WHEN THE #FIRE SPREADS!!

I followed that #MAGGOT and #BURNED it

May #TAMASH rot us all!
